alternativeNames: Takhtadjan, Armen Leonovich; Takhtadzhian, Armen Leonovich; Tachtadshjan, Armen Leonovich
examples: Artemisia araxina Takht. in Trans. Armen. Branch Acad. Sc. USSR, Biol. Ser. 2, 209. (1937).
source: Biogr. details in A. Takhtajan, Flowering plants: ix (2009). Death year from Ivan Tatanov. Obit. in Taxon, 59(1): 317 (2010), incl. portr. Appreciation in Pl. Sci. Bull., 56(4): 166-170 (2010).
